section.name: Contributing
section.p: A great description of contributing to Apache XML-RPC is available from the Jakarta project.

section.name: Submitting Patches
section.p: The preferred patch format is unidiff. Emails containing patches should be sent to the xmlrpc-dev@ws.apache.org list, and prefix their subject lines with [PATCH]. Patches are also accepted via the issue tracker. The Jakarta project provides a description of life with ASF source code -- look for the Patches section.
